title: The Production manager
creator_credit: Bruce Seth Greer, Gary Messenger and Universal Education and Visual Arts
brief_description: Outlines the role of the production manager in the making of a motion picture. Production Manager, Bud Brill, is seem at work - the strain, frustration and triumph are all here for the viewer to experience.
